span.em: In the Penfield Central School District, we are all learners who work collaboratively in an environment of educational excellence, providing experiences that develop the individual and diverse talents and abilities of all our students to prepare them for successful lives as life-long scholars and contributing, responsible citizens.

div.p: To assist families during the school closure, we have compiled a list of resources which have been centralized on our Coronavirus Information Page. ...

h4.a: Schools Closed Until at Least May 15

div.p:
Gov. Cuomo has announced that all NYS schools will be closed until at least May 15.
Please continue to monitor our Coronavirus Information page: ...

h4.a: Meal Service Change as of April 13

div.p: Given the success and efficiency of last week's Grab and Go Meal Program, the District will be following the same schedule from this point ...
The State Education Department has announced the cancellation of the June 2020 Regents Exams and released guidance on modifications to requirements ...

h4.a: Please Fill Out Your U.S. Census Forms!

div.p: The U.S. Census had begun and all residents are required by law to participate. An accurate count is vital for many school services and funding. The ...

div.p: This website is maintained by the Director of Communications and the Director of Technology according to the web publishing guidelines of the Penfield Central School District. If you are unable to access any aspect of our site, please email our district webmaster so that we may provide you with alternative means of access or use. The Website Accessibility Guidelines page contains additional information regarding accessibility.
